verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
All down through the ages
God has had a plan
To have a place to dwell in,
A house not made with hands;
He’s taken
One from a city
And two from a family,
Now He’s shaping them and placing them
For eternity.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We are living stones,
Being joined together;
We are living stones,
A city for our God.
Rejoice and be glad,
The building’s almost over
And He’s chosen you and me,
To be in His master plan.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus is the pattern,
He is the cornerstone;
He let the Father shape Him
As the blueprint for His home,
But God doesn’t want just one stone,
He needs a whole lot more,
Now He’s shaping them and placing them;
That’s what we came here for.
